name: world-through-my-eyes
description: Live first-person perception for OpenClaw agents via YouTube Live + Trio
author: openclaw-contrib

required.name: GOOGLE_API_KEY
required.description: Google Gemini API key (BYOK â€” costs billed to your Google account)

required.name: TRIO_WEBHOOK_SECRET
required.description: Shared secret for verifying Trio webhook payloads

optional.name: OPENCLAW_BASE_URL
optional.description: Base URL for OpenClaw event delivery

optional.name: YOUTUBE_API_KEY
optional.description: YouTube Data API v3 key for live status checks (oEmbed used as fallback)

tools.name: start_monitoring
tools.description: Start monitoring a YouTube Live stream with specified conditions

tools.name: get_events
tools.description: Retrieve perception events from an active session

tools.name: change_conditions
tools.description: Update monitoring conditions for an active session

tools.name: bind_agent
tools.description: Grant an agent access to a monitoring session

tools.name: revoke_agent
tools.description: Revoke an agent's access to a monitoring session
